sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import "../styles/lastNews.scss"; import moment from 'moment' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; export default function AllNews() { type News = { newsId: number, title: string, image: string, content:string, date: string; authorFirstName: string, authorLastName: string }; return (

Latest news

{news.map((news) => (

{news.title}

{news.content}

BY {news.author}

{moment(news.date).format('MMMM d Y')}

))}
) }
